description: This file declares functions and constants for interacting with the Rbus communication mechanism in the harvester component, including handle acquisition, initialization, status checks, and data retrieval such as Wi-Fi device and traffic statistics.
external_methods: rbus/rbus.h (functions related to rbus handle and data retrieval)

methods.name: get_rbus_handle
methods.description: Returns the handle to the Rbus instance used by the harvester component.

methods.name: rbusInitializedCheck
methods.description: Checks whether the Rbus is initialized and ready for communication.

methods.name: harvesterRbusInit
methods.description: Initializes the Rbus for the harvester component with the specified component name.

methods.name: harvesterRbus_Uninit
methods.description: Uninitializes and cleans up the Rbus resources.

methods.name: rbus_getBoolValue
methods.description: Fetches a boolean value from a specified TR181 path via Rbus.

methods.name: rbus_getStringValue
methods.description: Fetches a string value from a specified TR181 path via Rbus.

methods.name: rbus_getUInt32Value
methods.description: Fetches a UINT32 value from a specified TR181 path via Rbus.

methods.name: rbus_getApAssociatedDeviceDiagnosticResult
methods.description: Retrieves diagnostic information for associated Wi-Fi devices at a specific index.

methods.name: rbus_wifi_getRadioTrafficStats2
methods.description: Obtains Wi-Fi radio traffic statistics for a given radio index.

methods.name: rbus_wifi_getNeighboringWiFiDiagnosticResult2
methods.description: Retrieves neighboring Wi-Fi AP diagnostics, including whether the report was executed, the list of neighboring APs, and total count.
